name: info
title: What is a Knippie?
text: Knippie is cardholder wallet with the following features:

bullets.title: Recycled
bullets.text: the front of this wallet is made out of an old can and a misprinted plastic card

bullets.title: Scam Protected
bullets.text: Because of the alumnium front and back the wallet protects your cards from being scammed.

bullets.title: Super Slim
bullets.text: Because the cards are hold together by an elastic, the wallet will adept it's size to number if cards it holds. Therefore you will never have wasted space:)

name: made
title: How is the Knippie made?
text: Knippie is fully handmade, and goes through to following stages:

bullets.title: Laser Cut
bullets.text: The misprinted card is lasercutted on 4 sides by UncoverLab

bullets.title: Cut and Stamp Frames
bullets.text: Both the can and the alumnium plate need to be cut into the right size, sanded and stamped.

bullets.title: Fold Can
bullets.text: Fold the can around the card and into the lasercut lines, so all sharp edges are gone.

name: works
title: How does the Knippie work?
text: Knippie works by folding it open like a deck of cards and pick the card you need! Some Knippies also a moneyclip.

name: madeby
title: Made By
text: The Knippie is invented and produced by Anouk Boukema. But could have never done it without:

buttets.title: UncoverLab
buttets.text: "the World's First Tattoo Shop for Objects" Where the misprinted cards where laser cut. https://uncoverlab.com/

buttets.title: Metaal Winkel
buttets.text: The metal shop that pre-cut all the alumnium backsides. http://metaalwinkel-metalen.nl/

buttets.title: Vivan de Bruijn
buttets.text: For thinking of the great name: "Knippie", while sipping some coffee

name: order
title: How to get a Knippie
text: You can order a Knippie by sending an email to anouk@madx.nl, or sending a sms to 06-12377790

name: unique
title: Choose your own Knippie
text: Pick up or drink up a good looking can, hand it over, and we'll upcycle it to a Knippie.
